articles.title: Singapore reaches 80 pc double-vaccination rate but life is not returning to normal - ABC News
articles.description: Despite being one of the world's most vaccinated countries, Singapore is being forced to reimpose restrictions and delay opening up due to a surge in infections. So what does that mean for Australia's four-step opening plan, based on 80 per cent inoculation?
